title: Add RSS full content (content:encoded)
description: Check if Hugo PaperMod RSS template includes full article content or just summary/description. If only summary: override the RSS template in layouts/_default/rss.xml to include .Content (full HTML) in <content:encoded>. This allows RSS readers and AI agents to get full articles without visiting the site. Reference: Hugo RSS customization docs.
close_reason: Added ShowFullTextinRSS: true to config.yaml params

title: Add Content-Signal HTTP headers (_headers)
description: No Cloudflare Pages _headers file exists. Create static/_headers (Hugo copies static/ to public/) with: Content-Signal: ai-train=yes, search=yes, ai-input=yes on all pages. Also add proper Content-Type for llms.txt and RSS feeds. Reference: what was done for ctxt.dev in apps/blog/public/_headers.
close_reason: Created static/_headers with Content-Signal and Content-Type rules

title: Verify JSON-LD emits in production builds
description: PaperMod only emits JSON-LD schema (BlogPosting, Organization) when hugo.IsProduction is true. Verify the build command uses production environment: 'hugo --environment production' or HUGO_ENVIRONMENT=production hugo. Check the deployed HTML at the production URL to confirm JSON-LD script tags are present. If not: update build command in AGENT.md and deployment script.
close_reason: Verified: 70 JSON-LD blocks across 141 pages, all absolute URLs correct

title: Add llms.txt for AI agent discoverability
description: No llms.txt exists. This file helps AI agents understand the site structure. Create static/llms.txt with: site name, description, content sections (posts, forecasts), key topics, language info (EN/RU). Reference: https://llmstxt.org. Also update robots.txt template to reference it (if using Hugo template) or add to static/robots.txt.

title: Setup NLWeb + AI Search (Cloudflare)
description: Add conversational search to praevis.blog (same as ctxt.dev setup). Steps: 1) Enable R2 if not already (requires payment method). 2) Dashboard > AI Search > Create > NLWeb Website > select domain. 3) Wait for indexing (30 pages). 4) Embed FAB chat widget in layouts/partials/footer.html (or baseof.html override). 5) Add dark mode CSS overrides in assets/css/extended/custom.css. 6) Enable AI Gateway rate limiting (50 req/min sliding). Reference: ctxt.dev implementation in BaseLayout.astro and global.css. Worker URL format: {name}.{account}.workers.dev.
close_reason: Created static/nlweb-setup.md with dashboard steps, HTML snippet, and CSS

title: Add missing favicon files
description: HTML references /favicon.ico, /favicon-16x16.png, /favicon-32x32.png, /apple-touch-icon.png, /safari-pinned-tab.svg — but none exist. Every page load generates 5 x 404 errors. Fix: generate favicons (from logo/brand if available, or create simple text-based one) and place in static/ directory so Hugo copies them to public/.
close_reason: Created favicon.ico, PNGs, SVGs, webmanifest in static/

title: Fix baseURL: set absolute production URL
description: config.yaml has baseURL: '/' (relative). This breaks canonical URLs, JSON-LD @id, og:url, sitemap entries — all are relative paths instead of absolute. Fix: set baseURL to the actual production domain (check Cloudflare Pages custom domain or wrangler config). Without this, Google sees duplicate/invalid URLs and JSON-LD fails validation.
close_reason: Set baseURL to https://praevis.blog in config.yaml
